name: Boy's Varsity Baseball Game
desc: The boy's baseball team won their first game of the season!

name: Girl's Basketball Game
desc: The girl's basketball team tried their best, but unfortunately lost :(

name: Co-Ed Soccer Team
desc: The soccer team won a close game, 3-2!

name: Boy's Football Game
desc: The football game was the best of the season!!

name: Girl's Flag Football Game
desc: The girls won their first game of the season!

name: Co-Ed Tennis Game
desc: Unfortunately the tennis team is on a five game losing streak.

name: Golf Tournament
desc: The gold team performed second best in the district!

name: Co-Ed Swimming Meet
desc: The swimming team did not place at the finals.

name: Senior Orchestra Concert
desc: The orchestra concert was packed! Families loved the event.

name: Band Concert
desc: The band placed 4th at the district level for their awesome performance!

name: 4th Annual Poetry Jam
desc: 125 students showcased their prose at our delightful event.

name: Algebra II Math Competition
desc: Our math team won the first place prize at their last competition of the season.

name: Open House Information Night
desc: We welcomed students back to school and enjoyed meeting our new teachers!

name: Junior And Senior Prom
desc: We had the biggest prom in school history and had so much fun! :)

name: Homecoming
desc: After a successful football season, we enjoyed a relaxing night with our fellow students.
